content: appears, however, and asks to accompany him. The citizens as well as Neptune are shocked at such an idea. Neptune even wishing to go in her place. However, she calms everyone down by simply asking to trust her, explaining that a weak diplomat can represent peace much easier than a massive musclebound warrior. With great reluctance, they agree to her wishes, and she travels topside with the World Noble. The whole island goes into a state of unease during her away time, worrying about her welfare.
